headline.print_headline: A Vaccine May Shield Boys Too
headline.seo: Gardasil Is Increasingly Marketed as a Vaccine for Boys
headline.main: A Vaccine May Shield Boys Too

docs.lead_paragraph: Gardasil was introduced as a guard against cervical cancer, but it is increasingly marketed as an important vaccine for boys, too.
docs.snippet: Gardasil was introduced as a guard against cervical cancer, but it is increasingly marketed as an important vaccine for boys, too.

headline.print_headline: Hazards: Secondhand Smoke May Affect Hearing
headline.seo: Secondhand Smoke May Affect Teenagers’ Hearing
headline.main: Hazards: Secondhand Smoke May Affect Hearing

docs.lead_paragraph: Researchers found that youths with higher exposure to secondhand smoke were more likely to have suffered hearing loss at low frequencies.
docs.snippet: Researchers found that youths with higher exposure to secondhand smoke were more likely to have suffered hearing loss at low frequencies.

headline.seo: Counting Calories? Your Weight-Loss Plan May Be Outdated
headline.print_headline: Still Counting Calories? Your Weight-Loss Plan May Be Outdated
headline.main: Still Counting Calories? Your Weight-Loss Plan May Be Outdated

docs.lead_paragraph: The most detailed long-term analysis of the factors that influence weight gain shows that conventional wisdom may not be the best approach.
docs.snippet: The most detailed long-term analysis of the factors that influence weight gain shows that conventional wisdom may not be the best approach.
